descriptionFromLinkedin:
We have several apps in development that are custom builds for client and for our selves. We are looking for skilled developers that can understand the business needs, architect a solution and code the app with precision. These apps must be built with performance and security in mind. Our design team has a full set of designs and business requirements for each project. Based on your skill sets and the status of each project you will be matched the the right development to bring the project to fruition.

These projects can last as little as 3 months and as long as 2 years. As you come close to wrapping up one project we will get you geared up on the next one, while carving out time for you to maintain your creation. All work will be the property of Power On Marketing or the property of our clients. All work must be properly documented and backed up. A third party security team will review the work products and do white hat hacking to ensure the system is secure. So having strong expertise and capabilities is critical to our joint success.

At Power On Marketing you will be joining a tight nit team that works together to help each other fill the needs of our customers. It is a team environment dedicated to helping our employees achieve their personal success through ensuring our clients success. We offer a full benefits package including a 401K match. To find out more about this opportunity contact us today.

The compensation will be based on skills and experience, with Power On you will always be compensated well based on the value you provide to our company and our clients. We have a generous paid vacation/holiday schedule and much more.

Applicants must be a strong problem solver and solutions architect. you must have at least 5 years app development experience.

Power On Marketing is a fast growing marketing, website and system development company that is dedicated to making our clients succeed.
